data.expected_result: Whenever search gives no results, it should show an explicit visual saying nothing was found (as on the Desktop client)
data.short_description: Blank page shown instead of "No results found" visual : currently affecting "Add Channel or Category" in server notification overrides, emoji search, and audit log filter selector
data.steps_to_repro: - STR 1: Long press any server in your server list > "Notifications" > "Add channel or category", enter a nonexisting channel/category and observe - STR 2: In server settings, open Audit logs, tap Filter by user or action, and enter the name of a nonexisting filter - STR 3: Open Emoji picker, either in chat or in reactions, search emoji, enter a nonexisting emoji name and observe
